text: [You cringe a bit before pulling up your foot to look at the goo on your shoe.]
[You try to trace the source of the mysterious goo, and see that it goes down into the pool.]
[There are several other trails of it coming from a lot of different points on the edge, and they all connect together in a strange yet deliberate web.]
[What they all connected to in the middle of the pool was a shiny black film on the bottom of the pool.]
[Your thoughts trail off as you notice the flim starts to grow bigger.]
